Description.Text: Facilities The resort offers travellers a total of 75 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, room service and a conference room. Wireless internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. A bicycle hire service (for a fee) gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with a bathroom. The basic features of most rooms include a balcony. There is also a safe. A mini fridge and a tea/coffee station ensure a comfortable stay. An ironing set is also available for travellers' convenience. A TV and WiFi (no extra charge) add to the comfort of the holiday. The accommodation units include a bathroom with a shower. A hairdryer is also available. Sports/Entertainment The holiday complex features various options for cooling off on hot days, including a pool and an indoor pool. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. Leisure options at the complex include a gym, a spa, a sauna and a steam bath. For a fee, biking/mountain biking, golf and horse riding are also available. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. Options include breakfast.
